channel.title: How to Change Max Combat
channel.description: I don't even know where to look for this, I want to change the Combat from 126 to 138. If it's client sided Mod please move this. If Server Sided can anyone give me an idea of where to look?

item.title: How to Change Max Combat
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

It should be in either Player.java or Client.java.

Just use this like I told you earlier:

public int getCombatLevel() { int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5); int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5); int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]))); if (ran > attstr) { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[23])) * 0.125)); } else if (mag > attstr) { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[23])) * 0.125)); } else { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[23])) * 0.125)); } return combatLevel; }

And in the process void in Client.java, add/change this:

Just change the 21050 to your line ID.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Change Max Combat
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Assuming it’s PI, which it probably is, it would most likely be located in Combatassistant, or some other class with Combat in the name. But it may also be in the player class, or player handler. It would most likely still be the same method as the one above.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Change Max Combat
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

If this is delta its in you client.java in source folder and search for return 99
heres my code

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 99999999) return 120; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 120; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 120; }

but its should look like this…where I have 120 is where you 99 (max stat) should be
a help full youtube channel is this one
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8azT48KORT0

hoped this helped

Read full topic
